name: Hat Cat and the Obvious Crimes Against the Fundamental Laws of Physics
name_original: Hat Cat and the Obvious Crimes Against the Fundamental Laws of Physics
description:
A unique puzzle game from T-Bone Independent Software Solutions and Funky Ape Studios.

With its unique gameplay, colorful pixel art and catchy chip tune music, you'll find a lot to love in Hat Cat and the Obvious Crimes Against the Fundamental Laws of Physics. Also, you've got to admit that the title is awesome.

Features:
  • Unique spatial puzzling gameplay
  • Fancy, colorful retro graphics
  • Catchy chip tune music
  • Completely free (you can pay something if you want to)
  • If you choose to pay for the game, a high quality soundtrack (mp3 and flac) is included as a bonus
  • Over 50 levels with plenty of variation in both gameplay and design
  • Multiplatform: Windows, OS X and Linux
  • Beat each level with a minimal amount of loops to get coins that can be spent on fun extras
